# init(style:)

**Initializer**

Creates an appearance with default values that are appropriate for the specified button style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(style: UIBarButtonItem.Style)
```

## Parameters

- **style**: The button style. UIKit uses this value to configure the default appearance attributes. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/Style-swift.enum].

## Return Value

A new bar button item appearance object containing the default appearances for the specified button style.

## Creating a bar button item appearance object

- **init()**: Creates an appearance object with default values that are appropriate for a plain button.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates an appearance object from data in an unarchiver.
